devdoc.author: Ivan Carneiro
devdoc.details: A simple decentralized exchange implementation that enables swapping between two ERC20 tokens using the constant product formula (x+dx)(y-dy)=xy for price calculation.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

LiquidityAdded(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when liquidity is added to the pool by the owner

LiquidityRemoved(address,uint256,uint256.details: Emitted when liquidity is removed from the pool by the owner

TokenSwapped(address,address,address,uin.details: Emitted when a token swap occurs

params.tokenIn: Address of the token being sold
params.tokenOut: Address of the token being bought
params.user: Address of the user performing the swap

addLiquidity(uint256,uint256).details: Allows only the owner to add liquidity to the pool

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the DEX with addresses of both tokens

getPrice(address).details: Returns the current price of the specified token in terms of the other token

params._token: Address of the token to get the price for

returns._0: Price of the token with 18 decimal places

getReserves().details: Returns the current reserves of both tokens in the pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256).details: Allows only the owner to remove liquidity from the pool

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

swapAforB(uint256).details: Swaps TokenA for TokenB using the constant product formula

swapBforA(uint256).details: Swaps TokenB for TokenA using the constant product formula

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SimpleDEX

addLiquidity(uint256,uint256).notice: Only the owner can call this functionTokens must be approved before calling this function

getPrice(address).notice: Price is expressed as how many of the other token you get for 1 of this token

removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256).notice: Only the owner can call this function

swapAforB(uint256).notice: Tokens must be approved before calling this function

swapBforA(uint256).notice: Tokens must be approved before calling this function

tokenA().notice: The first token in the trading pair

tokenB().notice: The second token in the trading pair

userdoc.notice: The contract implements security measures including reentrancy protection and access control.
